name: Sounds of Somber (MaximumFlyer)
description:
This game was made for my college MAGD capstone team course.

Me and a team of 11 others decided to create a puzzle platformer that explores the mind of a psychologically isolated individual who suffers from anxiety and depression after a tragic event has happened to them.

If I'm being honest, the game was a bit rushed, and the scope was far too big to complete within a semesters time, but at least we have a final project to show for it.

I mostly assisted in enemy behavoir and other miscellaneous mechanics.
